text: @RealJamesWoods Unlikely. Biological weapons have been typically created to be ultra contagious, extraordinarily lethal, etc. They are meant as horrible second strike weapons to foreclose the possibility an enemy's victory. Covid19 does not fit that as it is less lethal than SARS1 and MARS.
